DataElementConcept.preferredName: Biospecimen Events Domain Other Biospecimen Type
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An events domain that documents biospecimen collection and storage information._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._The type of a material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes. This includes particular types of cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory substances.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

The type of a material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes. This includes particular types of cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory substances.
